childMdx.excerpt: The moon has moved since I first arrived here: now the light breaks in unfettered by my balcony bars; pure and still as I breathe out and…
Sometimes it's all at once, sometimes it takes weeks to gather one word, like now.   This expansive single point, pulsing still, for those…
That old music, the beat beneath time, taps out this peace, now arriving at the part where you tell me the whole is suspended in  Grace…
All my time spent, no time at all lost, in singularity:   this many-folded matrix, clear manifest of every message.   What touched one heart…
